column5: well i got out before the crowds this morn(4am) and it was cold!!!! managed a few in the dark and hit some nice ones in the light!!! got 2 little brownies as a bonus today!!! hit a few lost a few!! lol
and by a few you really mean 16 million right ??
Thank for the report and lovely photo.  I really should learn how to fish for them~!  I went to downtown Toronto in the morning and it was iced up LOL
Scott....awesome for a days work!  You always completely amaze me...I'm lucky if I even get one on in a day let alone landing double digits!!!
HOW HOW HOW HOWH HWOHWOHWOHOWHOWHOWH... gawd lol I will be out this weekend I hope I land 1   Great job
nice fish scott....way to go     cheers
those are some excellent looking fish, wish i had the sme horshe luck that you seem to have... or maybe its skill.... whichever it is... its got me jealous
tx all!!!! lots of rain next week they call for so watch it out there again!!!
Very nice looking fish, thanks for the report
Awesome report Scott.  I'm just reading all the reports I missed over the weekend.  Looks like they were on for you.  Nice to see the little guys growing up too  Joey
Nice report...  Again...  It's not that I'm bitter, just that I'll be happy to connect with that many steelhead in 2007...  Not bitter though...
Nice fish!  and where did you catch those?
